about_the_game:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Scharnhorst is one of the most famous German Navy ships of the late 1930s. She was often classified as a battlecruiser because of her 283 mm main battery guns. In World of Warships, she has a firing rate and speed unlike any other battleship. Her armor is also as good as that of the majority of other ships of the same type, making her an unsurpassed cruiser hunter.

Tier VII Scharnhorst B is a stand-alone Premium ship. The only difference in comparison to her standard counterpart—Tier VII Scharnhorst—is the color scheme of her permanent camouflage.

Key features:

  • Nine 283 mm guns mounted in three turrets. While her main battery caliber is inferior to that of same-type ships of her tier, Scharnhorst boasts a high rate of fire (20 seconds) and good turret traverse speed (25 seconds)
  • Advantageous citadel location: being underwater, its position makes it nearly invulnerable in medium- and short-range encounters
  • Maximum speed—30 knots
  • Torpedo armament that is typical of most German cruisers: three per side; range—6 km
  • She earns more credits per battle, and her camouflage adds a 50% XP bonus per battle and reduces the cost of your ship's post-battle service by 10%

Contents of this bundle:

  • Tier VII Scharnhorst B
  • Port slot

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will receive 6,650 doubloons as compensation.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570R
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000, Intel Iris 5100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 51 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 53 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

name: World of Warships — Black Scharnhorst 2019

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 51 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 53 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.1
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

esrb.descriptors:
Violence
• Mostly realistic setting
• Photo-realistic depiction

Violence Against Non-Humans
• Violence is often depicted from a distance
• Violence is rarely depicted close-up
• No blood and gore

Language
• Minor profanities (e.g. "damn"; "hell")

short_description: A German battleship with a fancy black exterior!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*
*languages with full audio support
